page.title: 10POTTEN END-THE POND II.
page.content:
THE PEOPLE HERE APPRECIATE THE LITTLE BIT OF WILDLIFE THEY CAN SEE AND ENJOY THE DIFFERENT SOUNDS OF THE BIRDS AND INSECTS.
OPPOSITE THE PUBLIC HOUSE ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE GREEN IS THE VILLAGE CHURCH AND RECREATION HALL. THE CHURCH IS VERY PRETTY AND HAS SOME VERY INTERESTING SHAPED TREES THAT SURROUND IT. WHEN PEOPLE COME OUT OF THE CHURCH THEY WALK ACROSS THE GREEN AND ROUND THE POND TO THE PUBLIC HOUSE. THEIR INTERESTS ARE OFTEN CAUGHT BY THE VARIOUS INSECTS ,BIRDLIFE OR FISH ON THE WAY AND THEY WILL STOP TO LOOK,AND LISTEN TO THE SOUNDS MADE BY THE WILDLIFE AROUND THE POND.
